com.st.st25sdk

Class NFCTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.NFCTag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Iso14443aTag, Iso14443bTag, Iso18092Tag, PicopassTag, STIso14443SRTag, Type1Tag, Type2Tag, Type3Tag, Type4Tag, Type5Tag

    public abstract class NFCTag
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class defines the basic methods to handle a NFC Tag

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NFCTag.NfcTagTypes

      Lists all communication modes

      • readBytes

        public abstract byte[] readBytes(int byteAddress,
                                 int sizeInBytes)
                          throws STException
        Read a number of Bytes at a given address In case of read error, the STException will contain the data that we have been able to read. Use e.getErrorData() to retrieve them.
        Parameters:
        byteAddress - First address to be read
        sizeInBytes - number of bytes to read
        Returns:
        the read data
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeBytes

        public abstract void writeBytes(int byteAddress,
                                byte[] data)
                         throws STException
        Write some Bytes at a given address WARNING: After this write, the cache may not be aligned anymore with tag's memory content so it is recommended to invalidate the cache.
        Parameters:
        byteAddress - First address to be written
        data - Data to be written
        Throws:
        STException
